segments.text: I observe this domestic scene unfolding in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying a dish, her back to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs unchecked, causing an overflow disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, drenching everything below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ankle-deep in the puddle, utterly unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, the children plot their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the teetering stool, hand diving into the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's bound to collapse under him any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl assists by reaching up, eyes full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such innocent mischief in the midst of danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is serene, a stark opposite to here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the potential mess and injuries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to these risks?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes wait, oblivious to the flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR
